name: MAKE\_BOX
intent: Assemble a Box as the fundamental semantic-geometric unit containing primitive entities.
delta\_action: δ acts internally on all contained geometric entities.
phi\_action: Φ projects Box contents into semantic forms.
chi\_action: STEPχ(B, χ) evolves all χ-active contents (Modes, fields, adjacency weights) according to the χ-family rules.
omega\_action: Ω(B) enforces Box-level global invariants (e.g., total probability, energy, or semantic mass) under χ-evolution.
